name: Alychmia
description:
PLEASE RUN THIS IN FULLSCREEN (BOTTOM RIGHT BUTTON). The ALT key is used and that will often switch to somewhere else on the browser if you are playing windowed.

You are an aura trying to achieve immortality. You must navigate through a castle to collect the necessary ingredients, but it will not be easy. There are a host of enemies waiting to defend your desire!

Controls:

Arrow keys for movement

CTRL to possess / ALT to leave

A to attack
